product_name: Salewa Wildfire GTX Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: The waterproof Salewa Wildfire GTX Hiking Shoes fit very close to your feet for excellent sensitivity when you're scrambling on rocks and logging miles on the way to your favorite climb. The compact toe area and the built-in arch support will make your approach more sensitive and dynamic. Shoes feature GORE-TEX(R) linings for waterproofness and breathability when you're on the trails. Technical lacing system allows for a precise forefoot customization for better edging and maximum precision. Toe flexibility increases balance and control for technical moves and increases grip on the rock. Spherical heels have an all-around free-form shape for maximum heel hold and the prevention of blisters. Anatomic last conforms to your feet, supports the arches and helps to create a blister-free fit. The innovative multilayer MFF+ insoles allow for customization in the fit of the shoes to accomodate greater range of foot shapes and sizes. Ballistic mesh uppers are reinforced with the EXA shell technology for lightness and durability. Vibram(R) Tech Approach EVO soles provide unbeatable climbing and edging performance on the most technical approach trails.
short_description: The waterproof Salewa Wildfire GTX Hiking Shoes fit very close to your feet for excellent sensitivity when you're scrambling on rocks and logging miles on the way to your favorite climb.
